amendment.description: To achieve a fair, equitable, and final settlement of claims to water rights in the State of Montana for the Blackfeet Tribe of the Blackfeet Indian Reservation and the United States, for the benefit of the Tribe and allottees, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5077 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5077 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 4979. (consideration: CR S5742-5743) To achieve a fair, equitable, and final settlement of claims to water rights in the State of Montana for the Blackfeet Tribe of the Blackfeet Indian Reservation and the United States, for the benefit of the Tribe and allottees, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5077 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5077 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Tester to Amendment SA 4979.
